properties.title: Rigi rope park
properties.abstract: Thrills at the foot of the Rigi with a view of Lake Lucerne: In the treetops above the Restaurant Alpenhof a total of seven routes are waiting to be discovered and climbed. The «Viper» route presents a challenge even for experienced rope park visitors.
properties.description:
Action-packed adventure for families, schools, clubs and all sports and outdoor fans: This is exactly what the Rigi rope park above Küssnacht offers. There are 7 routes to discover over around 4 kilometres.

There are multiple possibilities to change to another route. The heights vary each time and each route presents a different challenge: Visitors can expect a number of zip lines, a climbing wall, abseiling equipment and a flying horse. The «Viper» route, which includes a 25 m high moving climbing pole, is a serious challenge – even for experienced rope park visitors.

All visitors to the rope park – children from 1.35 m are permitted – are provided with the appropriate equipment. Before starting out on the routes, you are also instructed by experienced and well-trained guides in how to use and handle the equipment. After all, safety is the top priority.
properties.name: Seilpark Rigi GmbH
